title: Langland Bay: Woman pulled from sea in critical condition
article: A woman is in a critical condition after she was pulled from sea. South Wales Police officers responded at about 11:50 BST after receiving reports of a body in the sea off Langland Bay, on the Gower peninsula, Swansea. The force said the woman was airlifted to hospital. Mumbles RNLI lifeboats and a coastguard search and rescue helicopter from St Athan, Vale of Glamorgan, also attended.
